abstract: Rep John A Boehner is sworn in again as House speaker, fighting back challenge to his position from disgruntled conservatives as Republicans take control of both houses of Congress; makes no comment on discord in his party, but urges colleagues to set aside their differences and pledges to bring back function and civility to Congress.
lead_paragraph: Representative John A. Boehner beat back a challenge to his speakership from aggrieved conservatives as Republicans assumed control of both houses of Congress, pledging to restore function and civility.

byline.contributor: Ashley Parker and Emmarie Huetteman contributed reporting.

snippet: Representative John A. Boehner beat back a challenge to his speakership from aggrieved conservatives as Republicans assumed control of both houses of Congress, pledging to restore function and civility.

headline.main: Boehner Fends Off Dissent as G.O.P. Takes the Reins
headline.print_headline: Boehner Fends Off Dissent as G.O.P. Takes the Reins
